mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On The Record", "New Year's Greeting", "As I See It", "What Are They Dancing?", "Report From The Round Dance Standardization Panel-Part II", "National Convention", "The Walkthru", "Interview: Manning Smith", "Feature Fashion", "Style Series", "Young People in Square Dancing", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month: John Winton, B.C., Canada", "Paging the Roundancers: Emmett and Monette Courtney, No. Hollywood, Calif.", "Current Best Sellers", and "Experimental Lab".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
